Catalog.ResourceDescription.Name: get-feature-info-geowidget
Catalog.ResourceDescription.Author: jmostazo
Catalog.ResourceDescription.Description: This widget performs a getFeatureInfo operation over WMS layers. GetFeatureInfo provides feature information by identifying a point on a map based on its pixel location. The GetFeatureInfo request embeds many of the parameters required in the GetMap request along with parameters specific to querying layers.
